data.text: I don't feel happy or particularly safe, but at least I'm calmer with her here. It's nice to be near people who care about me in a nice way and don't treat me like what I am is too scary to be around.

I've spent a lot of tonight as a broom leaning against Dirk's new case board, which he's keeping in my room and which I enjoy staring at because everything about the board is so DIRK, and Beastie's just calmly napping on my roll-out mattress with Slurp curled against her side. 🐕
